room_title: Escape room "Secret of Dragon’s Spire" by Riddle in Mashpee
room_description: You are among a band of medieval thieves who have entered the cursed tower of Dragon’s Spire in order to find a legendary mystical artifact that holds the key to the salvation of the realm. The guards have been drugged but will only be unconscious for an hour, so you must move quickly, or all hope is lost!
